LandingOutcomeDef.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, {PILOT_nameDef} accidentally disengaged the grav engine too early, causing the gravship to free-fall for several feet. Some buildings on the gravship have sustained light damage from the crash.
While landing {GRAVSHIP}, {PILOT_nameDef} overheated the ship's thrusters, frying valuable components. The thrusters will need to be repaired before they can be used again.

While landing {GRAVSHIP}, {PILOT_nameDef} over-engaged the grav engine, causing it to overheat. The grav engine will take longer than normal to cool down. In the meantime, the gravship can't be launched.

While landing {GRAVSHIP}, {PILOT_nameDef} was forced to do an emergency maneuver, resulting in an intense and prolonged deceleration. The experience has left your colonists feeling extremely nauseous. The effects will quickly fade.
